remarks: Equality theorem for restricted uniqueness quantifier, with bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable restrictions. (Contributed by NM, 5-Apr-2004.)  (Revised by Andrew Salmon, 11-Jul-2011.)
statement:
raleq1f.1 $e |- F/_ x A $.
raleq1f.2 $e |- F/_ x B $.
reueq1f $p |- ( A = B -> ( E! x e. A ph <-> E! x e. B ph ) ) $.
